ComicInfo.Summary:
Probe's spaceship is destroyed by the Russian Death Ray. Probe fights his way into the Russian ship but finds out that the ship has to land in Russia.
An alien species overruns earth until they are stopped by themselves.
When the biker gangs of Mega City put on the Mega City 5000 Race to determine their leader, Judges try unsuccessfully to stop them.
